title: Suspicion Island
description: On Suspicion Island, if you don’t stay suspicious, you won’t stay alive. An addictive series honoring the reality tv tradition of beautiful people doing dumb things while stuff explodes.
quote: These pterodactyls are clones of my dead brother!
altHero: a woman screaming as she is carried away by giant talons, a shirtles man ponders pushing a giant red button, and another woman is upside holding her breath under water
alt1: a man and woman in tattered clothes are surrounded by pterodactyls
alt2: a group in tattered clothes walks through the jungle
alt3: a woman points and yells at a shirtless man
alt4: a woman holds a torch and screams as she sees the cave is full of animal skulls
